# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates an instance that type-erases [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AttachmentContent].

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency init<Content>(_ content: Content) where Content : AttachmentContent
```
